attributes.background: We the British people want an amendment to the current treason law making it an offence for any persons to leave the UK to travel to a foreign country to wage war on the streets of the UK who then to return to the UK to face treason charges!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
